title: Ticket #5440: Clarify distinction and use cases for scheduler and local universes
description:
As per a recent email from lmichael@wisc.edu to htcondor-staff, the text in http://research.cs.wisc.edu/htcondor/manual/v8.4/2_4Running_Job.html#SECTION00341000000000000000

should be more descriptive of the differences between local and scheduler universe, especially in indicating that scheduler universe is the default for the main job of any DAG, and would/should not otherwise be selected by the user in a submit file for any other type of job. Rather, the local universe is appropriate for all other user-submitted jobs.
creator: lmichael
